title: inum vandaarilaiyE
sahitya:
,,innum vandaarillai- | 



yE ariyaarO ||



,,Ezhai paDum tollai- | 



yE sakiyE ||



,,innum vandaarillai- | 



yE ... ||







anupallavi







,,punnagai purindu |



muppurangaLai erittavar ||



,,tennavar naaTaaLa |



,,shenkOl tarittavar ||



(innum)







caraNam







,,sen tamizh paNNilE |



,,sikki tavikkinrarE ||



,,vandiyin piTTukku |



,,vazhakkaaDi nirkinrarE ||



,,sundaran vENDiDa |



toodu naTakkinrarE ||



,,enta tisaikkEki |



,,enna seykinrarE ||



(innum)
